thread.title: One Direction's Liam Payne splits from Girlfriend
thread.title_full: One Direction's Liam Payne splits from Girlfriend

title: One Direction's Liam Payne splits from Girlfriend
text:
The star, from Bushbury, is said to be ‘incredibly sad’ over the break-up. It comes just days after the boyband was forced to cancel one of their live shows in Belfast due to the singer falling ill. 
A source close to the 22-year-old said: “Liam and Sophia have split. For more Wolverhampton entertainment news click here 
“Liam is incredibly sad but is going to keep busy. He really hopes everybody will respect both his Sophia’s privacy and will stop speculating.” 
On Saturday, Liam posted a message on his Twitter page saying: “I love how music is always there for you when you need it most x’. What do you think?
